content: In conventional languages like C and C++, all code had to be compiled and linked to one executable program, before execution. In Java, classes are compiled as needed. If a class is not needed during an execution phase, that class is not even compiled into byte code.
stemmed: In convent languag like C c++ , code compil link one execut program , execut . In java , class compil need . If class need execut phase , class even compil byte code .
